properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: This is a secret key used for signing and verifying JSON Web Tokens (JWTs).

properties.name: jwt.expiration.ms
properties.description: This is the duration (in milliseconds) for which a JSON Web Token (JWT) remains valid after being issued.

properties.name: jwt.refreshtokenexpiration.ms
properties.description: This is the duration (in milliseconds) for which a refresh token remains valid after being issued.

properties.name: app.frontend.url
properties.description: This is the URL for frontend application.
